Uses of Class
org.jasig.cas.authentication.RootCasException

  • Packages that use RootCasException 
    Package Description
    org.jasig.cas.authentication.handler
    The handler package contains the classes used to authenticate a user.
    org.jasig.cas.ticket
    Classes that represent tickets and can manipulate tickets.

    • Uses of RootCasException in org.jasig.cas.authentication.handler

      Subclasses of RootCasException in org.jasig.cas.authentication.handler 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AuthenticationException
      Deprecated. 
      As of 4.1, the class is required to note its abstractness in the name and will be renamed in the future.
      class  BadCredentialsAuthenticationException
      Generic Bad Credential Exception.
      class  BadPasswordAuthenticationException
      The exception to throw when we know the username is correct but the password is not.
      class  BadUsernameOrPasswordAuthenticationException
      Exception to throw when we know the credentials provided were username/password and the combination is wrong.
      class  BlockedCredentialsAuthenticationException
      Exception to represent credentials that have been blocked for a reason such as Locked account.
      class  UncategorizedAuthenticationException
      Deprecated. 
      As of 4.1, the class is required to note its abstractness in the name and will be renamed in the future.
      class  UnknownUsernameAuthenticationException
      The exception to throw when we explicitly don't know anything about the username.
      class  UnsupportedCredentialsException
      The exception thrown when a Handler does not know how to determine the validity of the credentials based on the fact that it does not know what to do with the credentials presented.

    • Uses of RootCasException in org.jasig.cas.ticket

      Subclasses of RootCasException in org.jasig.cas.ticket 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  InvalidTicketException
      TicketException to alert that a Ticket was not found or that it is expired.
      class  TicketCreationException
      Exception thrown if there is an error creating a ticket.
      class  TicketException
      Deprecated. 
      As of 4.1, the class is required to note its abstractness in the name and will be renamed in the future.
      class  TicketValidationException
      Deprecated. 
      As of 4.1, the class is required to note its abstractness in the name and will be renamed in the future.
      class  UnrecognizableServiceForServiceTicketValidationException
      An exception that may be thrown during service ticket validation to indicate that the service ticket is not valid and was not originally issued for the submitted service.
      class  UnsatisfiedAuthenticationPolicyException
      Error condition arising at ticket creation or validation time when a ticketing operation relying on authentication cannot proceed due to unsatisfied authentication security policy.
